full_text: MATERIALS 2 skeins of Purl Soho’s Nigh DK , 100% cashmere yarn. Each skein of this light worsted/ DK-weight yarn is 199 yards/ 55 grams; approximately 250 total yards required. We used the colors Ocean Storm, Raindrop Blue, and Warm Cognac. US 5 (3.75 mm), 24-inch circular knitting needles (NOTE: You can use longer needles if you like, but they may feel a little finicky toward the end when you’re working on fewer stitches!) GAUGE 22 stitches and 43 rows = 4 inches in double seed stitch (see Notes) SIZE Finished Length of Wingspan: 41¼ inches wide Finished Depth from Point to Middle of Cast-On Edge: 10¼ inches Pattern designed and written by Purl Soho founder and co-owner, Joelle Hoverson .
name: Ravelry: Cloudberry Bandana pattern by Purl Soho
